37407.summary: Some customers in the River Heights area of Medicine Hat are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
37407.title: May 17 – Medicine Hat (River Heights) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
